record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - July 17, 2008)

[Page: S6945]

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE, NUTRITION, AND FORESTRY
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Thursday, July 17, 2008 at 1 p.m. in room 328A of the Russell Senate Office Building.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON BANKING, HOUSING, AND URBAN AFFAIRS
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs be authorized to meet during the sessions of the Senate on July 17, 2008, at 10 a.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Thursday, July 17, 2008, at 9 a.m., in room SD-G50 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Finance be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Thursday, July 17, 2008, at 10 a.m., in room 215 of the Dirksen Senate Office Building.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Foreign Relations be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Thursday, July 17, 2008, at 2:30 p.m.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
